org.microtitan.diffusive.classloaders.factories

Interface ClassLoaderFactory

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    RestfulClassLoaderFactory, RestfulDiffuserClassLoaderFactory

    public interface ClassLoaderFactory
    Interface that defines a ClassLoaderFactory intended for loading classes over the network
    Author:
    Robert Philipp

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.ClassLoader create(java.lang.ClassLoader parentLoader, java.lang.String baseSignature, java.util.List<java.net.URI> classPaths)
      Creates a ClassLoader for loading classes over the network
      java.lang.ClassLoader create(java.lang.String baseSignature, java.util.List<java.net.URI> classPaths)
      Creates a ClassLoader for loading classes over the network.

    • Method Detail

      • create

        java.lang.ClassLoader create(java.lang.String baseSignature,
                           java.util.List<java.net.URI> classPaths)
        Creates a ClassLoader for loading classes over the network. Should default the parent class loader to the loader that loads this class.
        Parameters:
        baseSignature - The signature of the base method that shouldn't be diffused further
        classPaths - The list of URI specifying the web service end-point for retrieving serialized Class objects
        Returns:
        The ClassLoader for loading classes over the network

      • create

        java.lang.ClassLoader create(java.lang.ClassLoader parentLoader,
                           java.lang.String baseSignature,
                           java.util.List<java.net.URI> classPaths)
        Creates a ClassLoader for loading classes over the network
        Parameters:
        parentLoader - The parent class loader
        baseSignature - The signature of the base method that shouldn't be diffused further
        classPaths - The list of URI specifying the web service end-point for retrieving serialized Class objects
        Returns:
        The ClassLoader for loading classes over the network
